title: Popularity of Fidel Castro in Cuba 2015
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 50.0 is found at Response Very/somewhat negative and the minimum is found at Don't know / no answer where Response is 6.0.
Response Very/somewhat negative has 8.33 times more Share of respondents than Response Don't know / no answer which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Very/somewhat negative and lowest at Response Don't know / no answer.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 50.0 is found at Response Very/somewhat negative and the minimum is found at Don't know / no answer where Response is 6.0.
Response Very/somewhat negative has 8.33 times more Share of respondents than Response Don't know / no answer which is has the lowest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 3 number of Responses.
Response Very/somewhat negative has the highest Share of respondents and Don't know / no answer has the lowest Share of respondents.
There is a difference of 44.0 between the maximum Response Very/somewhat negative and minimum Response Don't know / no answer.
The Response Don't know / no answer has 1.5 times less Share of respondents than average.
The Share of respondents is 100.0 if we add up values of all Responses.
